casebody.data:
First Department,

March, 1955.

(March 1, 1955.) In the Matter of the Accounting of Chase National Bank of the City of New York, as Executor of Ann H. Smith, Deceased, Respondent. James N. Vaughan, as Special Guardian of William E. S. Waterous, et al., Appellants; L. C. L. Corporation et al., Respondents.

Decree unanimously affirmed, with costs payable out of the estate to all parties appearing and filing briefs. No opinion. Present — Peck, P. J., Cohn, Callahan, Botein and Rabin, JJ.
